ribo/babylon6/Q006311
{d}GIŠ.NU₁₁-MU-GI.NA lugal kalag-ga Šamaš-šuma-ukin šarru dannu lugal am-na-nu{ki} lugal kan₄-diŋir-ra{ki} šar Amnanu šar Babilu a₂-ŋal₂ šag₄ kuš₂-u₃-e lēʾûm mumtalku sipad {d}en-lil₂-la₂ še-ga {d}utu {d}AMAR.UTU-bi-da rēʾûm migir Enlil Šamaš lugal ki-in-gi uri{ki}-ra-me-en u Marduk šar KUR-šu-me-ri u ak-ka-di-i anāku ki ulutim₂ ama ugu-ŋu₁₀ nam-en-na lu-lu ašar nabnīt ummi ālittiya un-gal diŋir-e-ne {d}e₄-ru₆-u₈-a ana enūt nišī šumī ṭābiš mu dug₃-ga he₂-en-še₂₁-a lū tambi šarrat ilī Eruʾa uŋ₃ bir-bir-ra-a ba-ab-du₇-du₇ hul₂-le-eš ana puhhur nišī sap-ha-a-ti ki-in-gi uri{ki}-ke₄ dim₃-me-er gal-gal-e-ne ša KUR-ak-ka-di-i DINGIR.MEŠ rabûtu i-bi₂ mu-un-ši-in-bar-am₃-me-en hadîš lū ippalsūinnima ŋarza-bi silim-ma-bi ki-du-du ha-lam-ma-bi ana šullum parṣī u kidudê mašûtu ul-le-eš hu-mu-un-še₂₁-a-bi he₂-am₃ ulṣiš lū imbûinnima lipiš bal-til{ki} TIN.TIR{ki}-ta zag-bi hul₂ he₂-en-ŋa₂-ŋa₂ ultu qereb Baltil ana šubat balāṭu lugal diŋir-e-ne {d}{a}asar-ri-ke₄ ittiya hadîš lū iʾīra šar ilī Asari umun gu-la ur-saŋ {d}asal-lu₂-hi bēlum ra-bu-u₂ qarrādu Marduk e₂-saŋ-il₂ e₂-gal an ki-a barag-a-ni ina E₂.MIN ēkal šamê u erṣeti sikil-la ze₂-eb-be₂-da-aš hu-mu-un-ni-in-ri šubatsu elleti ṭābiš lū irmi dim₃-me-er gal-gal-e-ne barag ki-tuš-bi ša ilī rabûti āšib parakka zag til-la e₂-kur-ra ša gimri e₂-kur-ra me kal-kal šu-luh-ha-e-ne biluda-bi SUH-ga-e-ne parṣīšunu šūqurūtu pelludûšunu ki-bi-še₃ he₂-en-gi₄-gi₄ nussuqūtu ana ašrišunu lū utēr ud-bi-a bad₃-u₄-ul-li₂-sa₄-a inūšu bad₃-u₄-ul-li₂-sa₄-a bad₃ zibbir{ki}-bi lu₂-kur₂-ra dūru Sippar ša ina ešâti nakrī suh₃-sah₄-e bi₂-in-sig-ga bi-dirig-ga īnišu iqūpu de₅-de₅-ga-bi he-ši-in-gub-be₂-en miqittašu lū ušziz niŋ₂-sig-ga-bi kalag-ga he₂-am₃ en-šu-us-su lū udannin saŋ-bi sahar-ta hur-saŋ-gin₇ rēšīšu kīma šadî he₂-ni-ib₂-il₂ ina eperi lū ulli e-ne-ra ur-saŋ šul {d}utu {d}še₃-ri₅-da ana šatti qarrādu eṭlu Šamaš e₂-gi₄-a-bi-da-ke₄ niŋ₂-ak-ak-da-ŋu₁₀ u Aya kallāti epšētiya hul₂-le-eš sa₆-sa₆ igi bar-ra-eš-am₃ damqāti hadîš naplisāma me-e-ŋu₁₀ {d}GIŠ.NU₁₁-MU-GI.NA ša yâti Šamaš-šuma-ukin ni₂ sun₅-en-ze₂-en ašri pālihkunu dug₄-dug₄-ne-ne sag₉-ga-ŋu₁₀ atmâ dumqiya
